Getting started
===============

Installation
------------

If you have pip:

.. code:: python

    pip install etacad

Requirements
------------
* ezdxf

Links
-----

Visit the repositorie and tutorials on YT.

* `GitHub <https://github.com/AxelTAG/etacad>`_
* `Pypi <https://pypi.org/project/pyacad/>`_
* `Video Tutorials <https://www.youtube.com/AxelTag>`_
